meanings.definition: The larger of the two types of nuclei found in ciliate protozoans, containing multiple copies of the genome.
meanings.sent1: The macronuclei in ciliate protozoans hold many copies of the genetic material.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the macronuclei to understand the genetic makeup of ciliate protozoans.
meanings.sent3: The macronuclei in ciliate protozoans are like treasure chests full of genetic secrets.
meanings.sent4: The macronuclei are the libraries storing the blueprints of ciliate protozoans.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the macronuclei appear as bustling genetic hubs.
